description:
Libvirt netutils contains a get_network_info function that directly accesses the db to generate a network_info list.  This prevents melange/quantum being integrated with libvirt.

Libvirt should only get its network_info from the compute manager who gets it from the network_api.
title: libvirt uses its own get_network_info function
